text: George Rothera (12 November 1809 – 31 October 1841) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1832 to 1837. Mainly associated with Nottingham Cricket Club, he made ten known appearances in first-class matches.CricketArchive. Retrieved on 4 December 2008. He represented the North in the North v. South series. ==References== Category:1809 births Category:1841 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:English cricketers of 1826 to 1863 Category:North v South cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Nottingham Category:Nottingham Cricket Club cricketers
title: George Rothera
